h2_title: Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide
content: Use Immobilize when you can to stop it from zooming around and follow up with combo attacks quickly. Landing heavy attacks in this manner will knock the cart down, leaving it vulnerable to further follow-up attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rusty-Gold_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Rusty-Gold Cart', specifically from the subsection 'Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Use Immobilize when you can to stop it from zooming around and follow up with combo attacks quickly. Landing heavy attacks in this manner will knock the cart down, leaving it vulnerable to further follow-up attacks.
